segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the open window first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful with those neat bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea; she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be ruined if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor kids, the boy's stool is tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him eagerly, palm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for them; one wrong move and it'll be chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, making the floor slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
